thread.title: Customer Jain Makepeace
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer Jain Makepeace

author: Customer Jain Makepeace
title: Customer Jain Makepeace
text: Blew out a tire (probably from snuggling too close to landscape timbers. They guys@ Town Fair tried to find out whether I had purchased the tire there and bought road hazard insurance, which would have netted me a free replacement. No luck there, but then they swapped out the tire, put the donut away, and aligned it as well, all while I went to get a haircut. Everyone was pleasant and tried to educate me about proper tire maintenance, pointing out free services I get for having it done with them. A gal can't ask for more!
